#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
inline int inp()
{
    int noRead=0;
    char p=getchar();
    for(;p<33;)
	{
		p=getchar();
	}
    while(p>32)
    {
		noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
		p=getchar();
    }
    return noRead;
}
int main()
{
	int N,i;
	N=inp();
	int a[14]={1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024,2048,4096,8192};
	for(i=13;i>=0;i--)
	{
		if(a[i]<=N)
		{
			printf("%d\n",(1+2*(N-a[i])));
			break;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
